Cover Letter

My name is Andrey, currently I am holding the position of Head of Research and Development department at Distillery Tech (HQ is located in Santa Monica, US).

My Masters degree thesis is: "Service System of Transport Services". It includes design and development of a network geo service with pathfinding and decision making features. I have yet an unfinished PhD degree on the topic "Research and Development of an adaptive to user behavior systems". So my pure academic scope is intellectual adaptive systems. I have a several publications on this topic, including internal Samsung Electronics Paper Award. Also you may find my publication in IEEE repository on the topic "Visualization of Spatial Data Adaptive to Changes in the Database Structure"[link] which reflects my current academic direction. I feel comfortable to solve complicated research goals, implement prototypes and proof of concepts, architect and schedule any type of development. I am able to bake a production ready code as one of the results, but not really interested in 100% routine coding. I am expecting to have a position where I should solve machine learning/data analysis problems for any domain (context awareness, adaptive systems, AI, automotive, geo spatial data analysis are preferable, but not limited to), showcase and implement the results of the research.

Experiences

Head of Research and Development Department

2016 - Present
Distillery Tech, Santa Monica

R'n'D processes execution inside the company, give future project directions, solve the most challenging problems and projects by my own or using a group of researchers. My hands-on projects are related with data analysis, big data analytics, predictive analytics, machine learning algorithms, intellectual and AI systems architect and development.

Software Engineer/ Team Lead/ Researcher

2013 - 2016
Samsung Electronics, Seoul

Architecting data analysis, high-load and machine learning services, developing Context Aware and Location features for Tizen OS. During all my time there I was leading internal development groups from Samsung Research India and Samsung Research Poland. We were working on Tizen Maps API[link] , Tizen Context Framework and other projects. I have designed and implemented Place Detection and Classification algorithm[link], Staying Event Detection Algorithm and many others for Tizen Context Framework SDK[link]. Was involved into Samsung S-Voice project (Samsung Personal Assistant App). Also I was involved in the company perspective products and directions research activities.

Senior Developer/ Team Lead

2011 - 2013
Digital Pro, Russia

Successfully developed Datamining and Datascrapping SDK for parsing and data analysis. The own leaded team successfully finalized the project based on the developed SDK. The final product was sold to Garant corporation, the developed engine core is still in production.

Software Developer (2007-2011)/ Project Lead (2011-2013)

2007 - 2013
Science and Technology Center «Intech», Russia

Core, based on database stored metadata dynamical forms design and development. The successful Core production implementation: 2 commercial projects ported from an old technology. Front-end JavaScript framework design and development.

Projects

These side projects and open source libraries which were founded or contributed by me.

Tizen 2.4 Context Framework - Tizen as a platform is embracing context awareness by giving developers context and activity frameworks. This allows developers to launch apps on a contextual event and even allowing apps to collect app usage data of the user.
Web service unity framework - A virtual environment for collaborative work in a browser. Incudes virtual desktop UI, security and document sharing tools.
ElasticSearch Commandor - Elasticsearch routine operations management
SModel - Simple passive model implementation for Ruby apps.
